ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName="Proof_of_Concept", ISBLANK(TEXT(POC_Outcome__c)), ISBLANK(POC_Feedback_Notes__c), ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Qualification"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Discovery")), NOT(OR($Profile.Name="System Administrator",$User.Division="Finance")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost")) )
